entry.source: {F812}Voice\0{F813,0,185003}Stay away from that.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Voice\0{F813,0,185003}Stay away from that.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F813,0,185004}Huh... Not as many of you this time.{F801}Well, makes no difference to me.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F813,0,185004}Huh... Not as many of you this time.{F801}Well, makes no difference to me.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F813,0,185005}Welcome to the Yamato Perpetual Reactor!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,185006}Is that the greeting you two expected?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F813,0,185005}Welcome to the Yamato Perpetual Reactor!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,185006}Is that the greeting you two expected?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F813,0,185007}So what's all this about, huh?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,185008}You forgot all I've done for you and{F801}went with Yuriko... or Lilith, I guess{F801}I should say.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F813,0,185007}So what's all this about, huh?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,185008}You forgot all I've done for you and{F801}went with Yuriko... or Lilith, I guess{F801}I should say.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F813,0,185009}...This what you're looking for?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F813,0,185009}...This what you're looking for?{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Tayama walked up to {F843,0} and{F801}his fellow Samurai and flashed a small{F801}object to them.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Tayama walked up to {F843,0} and{F801}his fellow Samurai and flashed a small{F801}object to them.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F87B,17,1,1,1}{F813,0,185010}You only have to press this switch and{F801}the gate to the Expanse opens.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,185011}So... this remote is what that bitch{F801}Yuriko was after.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F87B,17,1,1,1}{F813,0,185010}You only have to press this switch and{F801}the gate to the Expanse opens.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,185011}So... this remote is what that bitch{F801}Yuriko was after.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,1,1,2}{F813,0,185012}If you know that much, then this{F801}needn't be difficult. Hand it here.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,1,1,2}{F813,0,185012}If you know that much, then this{F801}needn't be difficult. Hand it here.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F87B,17,4,1,1}{F813,0,185013}Blow me, kid. This thing won't just{F801}screw up Tokyo, it'd throw the whole{F801}world into chaos.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F87B,17,4,1,1}{F813,0,185013}Blow me, kid. This thing won't just{F801}screw up Tokyo, it'd throw the whole{F801}world into chaos.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,1,1,2}{F813,0,185014}Such concern, coming from the jackal{F801}who raises men solely to harvest them{F801}for red pills.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,1,1,2}{F813,0,185014}Such concern, coming from the jackal{F801}who raises men solely to harvest them{F801}for red pills.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F87B,17,2,1,1}{F813,0,185016}Do you understand? If the gate to the{F801}Expanse opens, Tokyo's gonna get a{F801}flood of demons comin' in.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,185017}More demons than our production lines{F801}of Reds can keep up with.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F87B,17,2,1,1}{F813,0,185016}Do you understand? If the gate to the{F801}Expanse opens, Tokyo's gonna get a{F801}flood of demons comin' in.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,185017}More demons than our production lines{F801}of Reds can keep up with.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F87B,17,2,1,1}{F813,0,185018}This city's gonna be stacked with{F801}mountains of stiffs ripped apart by{F801}the demons...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F87B,17,2,1,1}{F813,0,185018}This city's gonna be stacked with{F801}mountains of stiffs ripped apart by{F801}the demons...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Tayama is looking at {F843,0}...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Tayama is looking at {F843,0}...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F87B,17,4,1,1}{F813,0,185020}You'd march into a place that had it{F801}made and force them to change it all?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,185021}That's okay with you?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F87B,17,4,1,1}{F813,0,185020}You'd march into a place that had it{F801}made and force them to change it all?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,185021}That's okay with you?{F801}

entry.source: "I see no issue."{F801}"It is a bit vexing."{F801}
entry.target: "I see no issue."{F801}"It is a bit vexing."{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F87B,17,2,1,1}{F813,0,185022}...Alright, then. You're just another{F801}shithead, I see.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F87B,17,2,1,1}{F813,0,185022}...Alright, then. You're just another{F801}shithead, I see.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F87B,17,4,1,1}{F813,0,185023}Right? How could I allow that? How{F801}could anyone?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F87B,17,4,1,1}{F813,0,185023}Right? How could I allow that? How{F801}could anyone?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,1,1,2}{F813,0,185024}...Let's not mince words.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,185025}If you intend to kill us, then let's{F801}have it. We'll overcome you and take{F801}the remote.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,1,1,2}{F813,0,185024}...Let's not mince words.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,185025}If you intend to kill us, then let's{F801}have it. We'll overcome you and take{F801}the remote.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F87B,17,4,1,1}{F813,0,185026}*chuckle*{F801}{F802}{F813,0,185027}...That's too bad. If you'd just done{F801}what I told you to, I'd have let you{F801}into the Ashura-kai.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F87B,17,4,1,1}{F813,0,185026}*chuckle*{F801}{F802}{F813,0,185027}...That's too bad. If you'd just done{F801}what I told you to, I'd have let you{F801}into the Ashura-kai.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F87B,17,4,1,1}{F813,0,185028}But instead, I'll be making hay from{F801}the news of your deaths.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,185029}"The Ashura-kai won a stunning victory{F801}over the intruders from above the{F801}Firmament!"{F801}{F802}{F813,0,185030}"No one crosses the great Tayama and{F801}lives to tell about it." Sound good?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F87B,17,4,1,1}{F813,0,185028}But instead, I'll be making hay from{F801}the news of your deaths.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,185029}"The Ashura-kai won a stunning victory{F801}over the intruders from above the{F801}Firmament!"{F801}{F802}{F813,0,185030}"No one crosses the great Tayama and{F801}lives to tell about it." Sound good?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F87B,17,2,1,1}{F813,0,185031}Tokyo is mine.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,185032}And I won't let anyone screw around{F801}with my utopia!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F87B,17,2,1,1}{F813,0,185031}Tokyo is mine.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,185032}And I won't let anyone screw around{F801}with my utopia!{F801}

entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,12,1,1}{F813,0,185038}I don't know. Think for yourself.{F801}

entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,1,1,2}{F813,0,185040}You'll give us the remote now, yes?{F801}

I'll be waiting here. {F801}

entry.target: {F812}Yamato Takeru\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,459003}My power is for my master to use. And{F801}if you are the one with my medium...{F801}{F802}{F813,1,459010}An honor to meet you, Master.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,400005}Oh... Master {F843,0}, the Yamato's{F801}remote control is here on the floor.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}Which are you going to: the Tokyo{F801}covered in desert or the Tokyo{F801}engulfed in flames?{F801}

entry.target: "The Tokyo covered in desert."{F801}"The Tokyo engulfed in flames."{F801}"Neither, I think."{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}OK. I just wanted to know; sorry for{F801}butting in. Go right ahead.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}OK. I just wanted to know; sorry for{F801}butting in. Go right ahead.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}King Akira\0{F87A,85}{F813,1,401701}...Oh, it's you, Boss. Sorry, I was...{F801}just doing some thinking.{F801}{F802}I finally realized something after I{F801}became the King of Tokyo. When it comes{F801}to who I should be looking out for...{F801}{F802}I need to put everyone else first,{F801}right? I mean, I'm the King of Tokyo,{F801}after all.{F801}{F802}Having to worry about more than{F801}yourself is harder than a punch to{F801}the gut...{F801}{F802}To be honest, I already want to ditch{F801}it all, but I already told my sis{F801}about it... so I gotta stand firm.{F801}
